text: Vidklykannya shcho Isus, syn Mary, skazav, "O Dity Izrayilya, ya ye BOZHYY kur'yer do vas, pidtverdzhuyuchy Torah ta pryvedennya harna novyna kur'yera prybuty pislya meni chyya nazva bude navitʹ bilʹshe khvalytysya (Ahmad)." Todi, koly vin pokazav yim yasni dokazy, vony skazaly, "Tse ye hlyboke zacharuvannya
